snippet: The Bank of Russia has raised its key interest rate to 17 percent from 10.5 percent in a desperate move to boost its currency and rescue its troubled economy....

headline.print_headline: Russia Raises Key Rate to Protect Ailing Economy
headline.main: Russia Raises Key Rate to Protect Ailing Economy

lead_paragraph: The Bank of Russia has raised its key interest rate to 17 percent from 10.5 percent in a desperate move to boost its currency and rescue its troubled economy.
